name: Two Studies of an Ancient Statue (recto); Scylla and a Centaur (verso)
description: Two Studies of an Ancient Statue (recto); Scylla and a Centaur (verso); Nicolas Poussin (French, 1594 - 1665); about 1645; Pen and brown ink, with some later red chalk framing lines; 16.2 x 12.5 cm (6 3/8 x 4 15/16 in.); 86.GA.471; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Two Studies of an Ancient Statue (recto); Scylla and a Centaur (verso)
medium: Pen and brown ink, with some later red chalk framing lines
